mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.description AS "description", a.weight AS "weight", a.category_id AS "category.id", c.name AS "category.name", a.need_id AS "need.id", m.type AS "need.type", m.name AS "need.name", m.displayName AS "need.displayName", a.expression AS "expression", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user cc ON cc.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_item_category c ON c.id = a.category_id LEFT JOIN mod_motivation m ON m.id = a.need_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO int_category_need( id, description, weight, category_id, need_id, expression, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{description}, #{weight}, #{category.id}, #{need.id}, #{expression}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE int_category_need SET description = #{description}, weight = #{weight}, category_id = #{category.id}, need_id = #{need.id}, expression = #{expression}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
